short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get an answer at a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to get an explanation for stuff while browsing?
- highlight any text and click on the question mark
- press alt+q to mark any area on the screen and click on the question mark

"Huh?" might be right for you!
It's free. It's smart. It's simple.
